discourse_list.title: Decision to Delay Today\xe2\x80\x99s Executive till Friday 29th

content.content: @collateral-core-unit , @Protocol-Engineering  and @GovAlpha-Core-Unit  CU’s have made the decision to delay this week’s executive due to extra time required for running tests, making code reviews, and coordinating the work required with RWF and LTS(incubating CU). The combination of the above has pushed us past our typical weekly deadline. The code review and feedback rounds by PE have required minor changes to be made in the code base implemented by CES and new tests to be run. Due to the code base changes, new smart contracts have been deployed which requires LTS to update a set of legal agreements that include smart contract addresses relating to the HVB deal specifically between the Ankura Trust, RWA foundation and Genesis trading. The community can track the spell code and executive vote contents as they evolve. Thanks to all CUs contributing.

Let’s benefit of this opportunity by migrating MKR from expired delegate contracts  Despite repeated outreach we now have >30k MKR tokens unable to participate in governance… Migrating can be done here and literally takes a few clicks. cc @rune @Porter_Smith  Screenshot 2022-07-28 at 15.59.48962×972 135 KB

I want to confirm on behalf of @Protocol-Engineering that there were some minor technical changes discovered in review related to the smart contract compiler that prompted the re-deployment of some of the RWA contracts as a purely precautionary measure. Unfortunately these changes required an update to some of the legal agreements that had included the original addresses and which caused the delay to the spell. Thank you to affected parties for your understanding and patience with the process.

Thank you to @Protocol-Engineering for the excellent collaboration among the @collateral-core-unit and @Real-World-Finance HVB/SGF deal teams to get these changes implemented timely, efficiently and within the construct of the legal agreements. An excellent example of cross-CU collaboration and communication in a time sensitive environment for the benefit of Maker.
Great effort. Working together, in collaboration, is the way to grow!
This topic was automatically closed 14 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
